member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom
member.summary: A position of the Popup control where the control aligns its upper edge with the lower edge of the PlacementTarget and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the PlacementTarget. If the lower screen-edge obscures the Popup, the control repositions itself so that its lower edge aligns with the upper edge of the PlacementTarget. If the upper screen-edge obscures the Popup, the control then repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the lower edge of the PlacementTarget and constraint its height.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right
member.summary: A position of the Popup control that aligns its left edge with the right edge of the PlacementTarget and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the PlacementTarget. If the right screen-edge obscures the Popup, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the left edge of the PlacementTarget. If the left screen-edge obscures the Popup, the control repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the right edge of the PlacementTarget and constrain its width.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left
member.summary: A Popup control that aligns its right edge with the left edge of the PlacementTarget and aligns its upper edge with the upper edge of the PlacementTarget. If the left screen-edge obscures the Popup, the Popup repositions itself so that its left edge aligns with the right edge of the PlacementTarget. If the right screen-edge obscures the Popup, the right edge of the control aligns with the left edge of the PlacementTarget and constrain its width.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Top
member.summary: A position of the Popup control that aligns its lower edge with the upper edge of the PlacementTarget and aligns its left edge with the left edge of the PlacementTarget. If the upper screen-edge obscures the Popup, the control repositions itself so that its upper edge aligns with the lower edge of the PlacementTarget. If the lower screen-edge obscures the Popup, the lower edge of the control aligns with the upper edge of the PlacementTarget and constrain its height.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Center
member.summary: A position of the Popup control that aligns at the middle of the PlacementTarget.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PlacementMode.Relative
member.summary: A position of the Popup control that aligns the top left corner of the popup with the top left corner of the placement target with the horizontal and vertical offset considered in the calculations.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PopupBase.PositionOptionFlags.DisplaceForScreenBounds
member.summary: Tries to calculate the position so that the popup is within screen bounds.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.PopupBase.PositionOptionFlags.DisplaceForKeyboardBounds
member.summary: Tries to calculate the position so that the popup is outside keyboard bounds.

member.summary: An event needed to work around a peculiarity in UWP where the TopHeader is unloaded while being shown on screen.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadTabView.IsContentPreserved
member.summary: Specifies whether the state of the content will be preserved when the selection is changed.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadTabView.IsContentSwipingAnimationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether a swipe inside the content will change the selected item with animation.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadTabView.IsContentSwipingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether a swipe inside the content will change the selected item.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.Toolbar.ToolbarItemsPanel
member.summary: A class that exists only to try and make the code a bit more readable.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadToolbar`1.PushCompositeItem(Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.ToolbarItem)
member.summary: Navigates to the child items of a composite toolbar item by pushing it in the composite-items stack.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadToolbar`1.PopCompositeItem
member.summary: Tries to navigate back to the child items of the previous toolbar item in the composite-items stack. If there is no toolbar item to navigate to, then the items of the toolbar are displayed.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.ToolbarItem.Items
member.summary: Gets a collection with the child items of this toolbar item. When is set to true, the toolbar items specified with this property are appended after the auto-generated ones.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.ToolbarItem.AutoGenerateItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically generate child items if the specific ToolbarItem inheritor class has any default items.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.ToolbarItem.AutoGenerateBackButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically generate a back button when the ToolbarItem is used as a composite item.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.ToolbarItemBase.IsOverflowItem
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this should be displayed only in the overflow popup.
